td.content: s:77 year old male presents with mild vomiting of 3 weeks duration together with mild recurrent epigastric pain, mild nausea. o:Height 173 cm, Weight 55.5 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed FLUOROURACIL - 500 mg IV, mitomycin - 10 mg/m2 IV, and ordered US Pancreas.
